messages.title: Same old Tories
messages.content: The Tories are treating our area with contempt. They have just parachuted in a London-based lawyer as their candidate here. Hexham is his fourth choice seat! The map shows choices in Wales and the South where he tried to be MP before moving here 1 year ago! Why should we have an MP who ranks us 4th best? Don't we deserve better?

messages.title: Local Lib Dem
messages.content: Family man who puts our area first and has lived & worked here most of his life.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The map shows choices in Wales and the South where he tried to be MP before moving here 1 year ago

leaflet.personalStatement: Family man who puts our area first and has lived & worked here most of his life.

politicalExperience.achievements: local voice for local people, track record of hard work for local government
